title: Hydrogen bond-mediated pseudo-halide complexation for stable and efficient perovskite precursors and solar cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02793K, Paper
Taeyeong Yong, Seongmin Choi, Soo-Kwan Kim, Sanghun Han, Gayoung Seo, Hae Jeong Kim, Jin Young Park, Han Na Yu, Hyung Ryul You, Eon Ji Lee, Gyudong Lee, Wonjong Lee, Sunkyu Kim, Siwon Yun, Yujin Lee, Jaebaek Lee, Dae-Hwan Kim, Sung Jun Lim, Dae-Hyun Nam, Younghoon Kim, Jongchul Lim, Byung Joon Moon, Jongmin Choi
We present an integrated stabilizing approach to manage both perovskite precursors and films through modification by hydrogen bonding-mediated complexation.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
